Text: ha, just came on to let you know about the boobs in episode 6 and found this!  thanks for the great job you've done!
Thanks for uploading these! I'm also eagerly waiting for the censored version of the first episode from season 3!!!
i don't mean this an annoying way, just wondering, will you be uploading season 3?  and how consistent do you think you'll be?  no pressure!

Flame_Leg mentioned in another comment that he would consider releasing season 3 as it airs.  I think he was open to everyones preference, as it airs or as a season after it finished airing.

I personally hope you release them as they air!  I support you 100% and thank you Flame_Leg!
Excellent show, I recommend reading the books if you havent already!
